attributes.action: Remove the Speaker of the Houses of Parliament - Mr John Bercow
attributes.additional_details: Mr Bercow has a history of exceeding his brief as Speaker of the Houses of Parliament many time and each time the excess is getting more. The Speaker of the Houses of Parliament should be completely un-bias as would be shown from a politician in such a focussed position as Mr Bercow is.
attributes.background: Mr John Bercow is a Hypocrite by allowing another dubious leader to address parliament but stating that he would block the leader of the free world speaking and far exceeding his power and not showing an unbiased position that would be expected of a speaker of the houses of parliament.

rejection.details:
There is no mechanism for the removal of a Speaker during a Parliament. Other than at a general election, the Speaker can only stop being Speaker through resignation or death.

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
